DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy predilation paclitaxel-eluting balloon bare metal stent implantation VS conventional balloon drug-eluting stent implantation term restenosis
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Between Paclitaxel-eluting Balloon Combination With BMS Implantation v Conventional Balloon DES Implantation
DOC.criteria: age > 18 year angina stress test positive ischemia de novo coronary stenosis > 50 % recent myocardial infarction ( < 72h ) severe chronic kidney disease allergy Paclitaxel contraindication combine antiplatelet treatment life expectancy < 1 year hypersensitivity contraindication one study drug lack consent
